donate.description:
do you want me to stay online?
so how about making a little donation?
everyone is welcome and, of course, you will be helping me a lot, nowadays hosts are costing around **R$45.00** (Brazilian currency, this one costing **8.89 US dollars**), and you can help me stay online by donating, it's worth remembering that it's optional, if you can't donate, no problem :)
donate.author: click here if the url button is not showing
donate.footer: warning: sharing any of my dev's personal information will result in a permanent ban
